content: **please note that this is an ad-free pdf version of a crochet pattern that can be found for free with ads on my blog here ** https //joyofmotioncrochet com/crochet-quick-classic-ear-warmer-free-crochet-pattern/ ★ crochet pattern for the quick classic ear warmer ★ perfect to stay warm with during winter ★ adult size can be adjusted ★ skill level easy ★ language english / us crochet terms the crochet quick classic ear warmer is a easy crochet pattern that uses beautiful stitches to create texture it s crocheted with bulky yarn & because of that it keeps you super warm for fall & winter change up the colors or use multiple colors to make it fit your style the best thing about this ear warmer pattern is the fact that you can crochet it in just 1 evening or maybe just 1 hour pattern contains ☆ gauge ☆ pictures ☆ sizing & measurements inches & metric ☆ instructions ☆ & a bunch more details ★ also included follow up by email in case you need any help you will need size 7 mm / us / uk 2 yarn yarn used bernat roving yarn amount used <1 skein / 50 g / 54 5 m / 60 yards yarn characteristics 5 bulky yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool other materials needed needle scissors measuring tape stitch marker more ☆ visit my blog https //joyofmotioncrochet com keep yourself updated on joy of motion through ☆ newsletters keep me updated https //joyofmotioncrochet com/newsletter ☆ instagram @joyofmotion https //www instagram com/joyofmotion/ ☆ facebook https //www facebook com/joyofmotioncrochet https //www facebook com/joyofmotioncrochet ☆ pinterest http //www pinterest com/joyofmotion/ http //www pinterest com/joyofmotion/ this crochet pattern is designed by me janne owner of joy of motion i design crochet patterns & share them with the world by selling them online i designed my first crochet pattern in 2011 & now i m hooked finally all my crochet patterns are made from my own ideas & inspiration as a result of my creativity i really love trying something new all my crochet patterns can be used to produce & sell handmade however you are required to let joy of motion know & credit joy of motion as the designer finally you can not resell the pattern as your own
